text.0: agni accept this flaming brand this waiting with my prayer on thee.
text.1: hear graciously these songs of praise.
text.2: with this hymn let us honour thee seeker of horses son of strength.
text.3: with this fair hymn thou nobly born.
text.4: as such lover of song with songs wealthlover giver of our wealth.
text.5: with reverence let us worship thee.
text.6: be thou for us a liberal prince giver and lord of precious things.
text.7: drive those who hate us far away.
text.8: such as thou art give rain from heaven give strength which no man may resist.
text.10: to him who lauds thee craving help most youthful envoy through our song.
text.11: most holy herald come thou nigh.
text.12: between both races agni sage well skilled thou passest to and fro.
text.14: befriend us thou as knowing all sage duly worship thou the gods.
text.15: and seat thee on this sacred grass.
